# The `TransferTracker` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Tracker for converting machine value locations and variable values into variable locations (the output of <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/livedebugvalues">LiveDebugValues</a>), recorded as DBG&#95;VALUEs specifying block live-in locations and transfers within blocks. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

Tracker for converting machine value locations and variable values into variable locations (the output of <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/livedebugvalues">LiveDebugValues</a>), recorded as DBG&#95;VALUEs specifying block live-in locations and transfers within blocks.

Operating on a per-block basis, this class takes a (pre-loaded) <a href="/docs/api/classes/livedebugvalues/mloctracker">MLocTracker</a> and must be initialized with the set of variable values that are live-in to the block. The caller then repeatedly calls process(). <a href="/docs/api/classes/transfertracker">TransferTracker</a> picks out variable locations for the live-in variable values (if there <em>is</em> a location) and creates the corresponding DBG&#95;VALUEs. Then, as the block is stepped through, transfers of values between machine locations are identified and if profitable, a DBG&#95;VALUE created.

This is where debug use-before-defs would be resolved: a variable with an unavailable value could materialize in the middle of a block, when the value becomes available. Or, we could detect clobbers and re-specify the variable in a backup location. (XXX these are unimplemented).

Definition at line 177 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/livedebugvalues/instrrefbasedimpl-cpp">InstrRefBasedImpl.cpp</a>.

### checkInstForNewValues() {#aa1129d2080e1308fd9bd27d20374ace5}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void TransferTracker::checkInstForNewValues (unsigned Inst, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ae34c996b58df9b9ce6695a0c8b70c533">MachineBasicBlock::iterator</a> pos)</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
After the instruction at index <code>Inst</code> and position <code>pos</code> has been processed, check whether it defines a variable value in a use-before-def.

If so, and the variable value hasn&#39;t changed since the start of the block, create a DBG&#95;VALUE.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/livedebugvalues/instrrefbasedimpl-cpp/#l00524">524</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/livedebugvalues/instrrefbasedimpl-cpp">InstrRefBasedImpl.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### clobberMloc() {#ac9ed6c9ebb7ede8539a8fe20bfeb36c2}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void TransferTracker::clobberMloc (<a href="/docs/api/classes/livedebugvalues/locidx">LocIdx</a> MLoc, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ae34c996b58df9b9ce6695a0c8b70c533">MachineBasicBlock::iterator</a> Pos, bool MakeUndef=<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/basicaliasanalysis-cpp/#af6d5cafbdfc5313e65d990120021a3ec">true</a>)</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Account for a location <code>mloc</code> being clobbered.

Examine the variable locations that will be terminated: and try to recover them by using another location. Optionally, given <code>MakeUndef</code>, emit a DBG&#95;VALUE to explicitly terminate a location if it can&#39;t be recovered.

### loadInlocs() {#a304b877a673788ae4edd0e8f5fa1d5d8}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void TransferTracker::loadInlocs (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &amp; MBB, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/livedebugvalues/#a7697a3c717033a44ba7f9b272c1d5331">ValueTable</a> &amp; MLocs, <a href="/docs/api/classes/livedebugvalues/dbgopidmap">DbgOpIDMap</a> &amp; DbgOpStore, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl</a>&lt; std::pair&lt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/livedebugvalues/#a2ad7532d3e36d429cab7c3ade85c5f77">DebugVariableID</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/livedebugvalues/dbgvalue">DbgValue</a> &gt; &gt; &amp; VLocs, unsigned NumLocs)</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Load object with live-in variable values.

<code>mlocs</code> contains the live-in values in each machine location, while <code>vlocs</code> the live-in variable values. This method picks variable locations for the live-in variables, creates DBG&#95;VALUEs and puts them in <a href="#af06b11c084b9a4ff7e063e146d4131d3">Transfers</a>, then prepares the other object fields to track variable locations as we step through the block. FIXME: could just examine mloctracker instead of passing in <code>mlocs</code>?

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/livedebugvalues/instrrefbasedimpl-cpp/#l00451">451</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/livedebugvalues/instrrefbasedimpl-cpp">InstrRefBasedImpl.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### loadVarInloc() {#af64654b3c46ec3154963aed1dbb016d2}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void TransferTracker::loadVarInloc (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &amp; MBB, <a href="/docs/api/classes/livedebugvalues/dbgopidmap">DbgOpIDMap</a> &amp; DbgOpStore, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl</a>&lt; <a href="#afa24ee75e581d521a08c6731becbc964">ValueLocPair</a> &gt; &amp; ValueToLoc, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/livedebugvalues/#a2ad7532d3e36d429cab7c3ade85c5f77">DebugVariableID</a> VarID, <a href="/docs/api/classes/livedebugvalues/dbgvalue">DbgValue</a> Value)</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
For a variable <code>Var</code> with the live-in value <code><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a></code>, attempts to resolve the <a href="/docs/api/classes/livedebugvalues/dbgvalue">DbgValue</a> to a concrete DBG&#95;VALUE, emitting that value and loading the tracking information to track Var throughout the block.

<code>ValueToLoc</code> is a map containing the best known location for every <a href="/docs/api/classes/livedebugvalues/valueidnum">ValueIDNum</a> that <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> may use. <code>MBB</code> is the basic block that we are loading the live-in value for. <code>DbgOpStore</code> is the map containing the DbgOpID-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/livedebugvalues/dbgop">DbgOp</a> mapping needed to determine the values used by <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a>.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/livedebugvalues/instrrefbasedimpl-cpp/#l00356">356</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/livedebugvalues/instrrefbasedimpl-cpp">InstrRefBasedImpl.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
